data.meta_description: Mena Suvari & Simone Sestito, Unfortunately, her soon to be ex husband Sestito has been a little less lucky according to the paperwork filed by Sestito amid their impending divorce, Sestito is way in the RED on both his personal and business related accounts, and has had to resort to credit cards and loans from his parents to pay off his bills. So as part of his divorce litigation, he's asking Mena for a little over $17,000 a month, plus an additional $10,000 for the legal fees he's accrued in t
